import*as actionTypes from"./constants";import{getListTitle,getRankingList}from"@/services/ranking";var changeListTitleAction=function changeListTitleAction(res){return{type:actionTypes.CHANGE_LIST_TITLE,listTitle:res.list};};var changePlayListAction=function changePlayListAction(res){return{type:actionTypes.CHANGE_PLAY_LIST,playList:res.playlist};};// 外部暴露
export var changeCurrentIndexAction=function changeCurrentIndexAction(index){return{type:actionTypes.CHANGE_CURRENT_INDEX,currentIndex:index};};export var getListTitleAction=function getListTitleAction(){return function(dispatch){getListTitle().then(function(res){dispatch(changeListTitleAction(res));});};};export var getRankingAction=function getRankingAction(id){return function(dispatch){getRankingList(id).then(function(res){dispatch(changePlayListAction(res));});};};
